00014 ShapeFunctionRBF::ShapeFunctionRBF( int dim_in,
00015                                     int nn_in,
00016                                     int mm_in,
00017                                     int rbfType_in,
00018                                     double& alpha_c_in,
00019                                     double& d_c_in,
00020                                     double& q_in,
00021                                     GaussPoint* gp_in
00022                                   )
00023   : ShapeFunction(gp_in)
00024     , dim(dim_in)
00025     , nn(nn_in)
00026     , mm(mm_in)
00027     , rbfType(rbfType_in)
00028     , alpha_c(alpha_c_in)
00029     , d_c(d_c_in)
00030     , q(q_in)
00031 {
00032   g_o.resize(nn+mm, nn+mm);
00033   this->phi.resize(6, nn+mm);

00052 void ShapeFunctionRBF::calc()
00053 {
00054   computeMomentMatrix();
00055   // Solve linear eq for shape function:
00056   computePhi(gp->x, gp->y);
00057 //   computePhi(0.2, 0.4);
00058 }
00059 
00060 void ShapeFunctionRBF::computeMomentMatrix()
00061 {
00062   double radius;
00063 
00064   if (dim != 2)
00065     std::cout << "Warning, space dimension is not implemented." << std::endl;
00066   // Switch type of RBF:
00067   switch (rbfType){
00068     case 0:
00069       // rbfType = 0 -> MQ
00070       // Compute R(i,j) = ((x_i - x_j)^2 + (y_i - y_j)^2 + (alpha_c*d_c)^2 )^q
00071       for (int i=0; i<nn; ++i){
00072         for (int j=0; j<nn; ++j){
00073           g_o(i,j) = std::pow(std::pow( gp->supportNodes[i]->getx() - gp->supportNodes[j]->getx(), 2) +
00074                               std::pow( gp->supportNodes[i]->gety() - gp->supportNodes[j]->gety(), 2) +
00075                               std::pow( (alpha_c * d_c), 2), q);
00076         }
00077       }
00078     break;
00079 
00080     case 1:
00081       // rbfType = 1 -> EXP
00082       // Compute R(i,j) = exp( -alpha_c*( (x_i - x_j)^2 + (y_i - y_j)^2 ) / d_c^2 )
00083       for (int i=0; i<nn; ++i){
00084         for (int j=0; j<nn; ++j){
00085           g_o(i,j) = std::exp( -alpha_c *
00086                               ( std::pow (gp->supportNodes[i]->getx() - gp->supportNodes[j]->getx() , 2) +
00087                                 std::pow (gp->supportNodes[i]->gety() - gp->supportNodes[j]->gety() , 2) )
00088                                / std::pow( d_c, 2) );
00089         }
00090       }
00091       break;
00092 
00093       case 10:
00094       // rbfType = 10 -> Wu-C2
00095       // Compute R(i,j) = (1 - radius/d_c)^5 * (8 + 40*(radius/d_c) + 48*(radius/d_c)^2 + 25*(radius/d_c)^3 + 5*(radius/d_c)^4 )
00096       for (int i=0; i<nn; ++i){
00097         for (int j=0; j<nn; ++j){
00098           radius = std::pow(std::pow( gp->supportNodes[i]->getx() - gp->supportNodes[j]->getx(), 2) +
00099                             std::pow( gp->supportNodes[i]->gety() - gp->supportNodes[j]->gety(), 2), 0.5 );
00100           if (radius < d_c){
00101             g_o(i,j) = std::pow(1 - radius/d_c, 5)
00102                       * (  8 +
00103                           40*(radius/d_c) +
00104                           48*std::pow(radius/d_c, 2) +
00105                           25*std::pow(radius/d_c, 3) +
00106                             5*std::pow(radius/d_c, 4) ) ;
00107           } else{
00108             g_o(i,j) = 0.;
00109           }
00110         }
00111       }
00112       break;
00113   }
00114   if (mm > 0){
00115     for (int i=0; i<nn; ++i){
00116       g_o(i, nn) = 1.;
00117       if (mm > 1){
00118         g_o(i, nn+1) = gp->supportNodes[i]->getx();
00119         g_o(nn+1, i) = g_o(i, nn+1);
00120         if(mm > 2){
00121           g_o(i, nn+1) = gp->supportNodes[i]->gety();
00122           g_o(nn+1, i) = g_o(i, nn+1);
00123         }
00124         else std::cout << "WARNING: incomplete polynomial." << std::endl;
00125       }
00126     }
00127   }
00128 }
00129 
00130 void ShapeFunctionRBF::computePhi(double xp, double yp)
00131 {
00132   lmx::Vector<double> lhs(nn);
00133   lmx::Vector<double> phii(nn);
00134   lmx::DenseMatrix<double> rk(6, nn); 
00135   double rr, rr2, xn, yn;
00136 
00137   // For each derivative, first the lhs is calculated (= d^n/dx^n{ R(x) Pm(x) }^T) and then the linear system is solved to get {phi(n)}
00138   if (dim != 2)
00139     std::cout << "Warning, space dimension is not implemented." << std::endl;
00140   // Switch type of RBF:
00141   switch (rbfType){
00142     case 0:
00143       // rbfType = 0 -> MQ
00144       // Compute R(i,j) = ((x_i - x_j)+(y_i - y_j) + (alpha_c*d_c)^2 )^q
00145       for (int j=0; j<nn; ++j){
00146         xn = gp->supportNodes[j]->getx();
00147         yn = gp->supportNodes[j]->gety();
00148         rr2 = std::pow( xp - xn, 2) +
00149                 std::pow( yp - yn, 2);
00150         rk(0,j) = std::pow( rr2 + std::pow(alpha_c * d_c, 2 ), q);
00151         rk(1,j) = 2. * q * std::pow( rr2 + std::pow(alpha_c * d_c, 2) , q-1. ) * ( xp - xn );
00152         rk(2,j) = 2. * q * std::pow( rr2 + std::pow(alpha_c * d_c, 2) , q-1. ) * ( yp - yn );
00153         rk(3,j) = 2 * q * std::pow( rr2 + std::pow(alpha_c * d_c, 2) , q-1 ) +
00154             4 * q * (q-1) * std::pow( rr2 + std::pow(alpha_c * d_c, 2) , q-2 ) * std::pow( xp - xn, 2 );
00155         rk(4,j) = 4 * q * (q-1) * ( xp - xn ) * ( yp - yn ) *
00156             std::pow( rr2 + std::pow(alpha_c * d_c, 2) , q-2 );
00157         rk(5,j) = 2 * q * std::pow( rr2 + std::pow(alpha_c * d_c, 2) , q-1 ) +
00158             4 * q * (q-1) * std::pow( rr2 + std::pow(alpha_c * d_c, 2) , q-2 ) * std::pow( yp - yn, 2 );
00159       }
00160       break;
00161 
00162     case 1:
00163     {
00164       // rbfType = 1 -> EXP
00165       // Compute R(i,j) = exp( -alpha_c*( (x_i - x_j)^2+(y_i - y_j)^2 ) / d_c^2 )
00166       double qq = alpha_c / std::pow(d_c, 2);
00167       for (int j=0; j<nn; ++j){
00168         xn = gp->supportNodes[j]->getx();
00169         yn = gp->supportNodes[j]->gety();
00170         rr2 = std::pow( xp - xn, 2) +
00171             std::pow( yp - yn, 2);
00172         rk(0,j) = std::exp( -qq * rr2);
00173         rk(1,j) = -2 * qq * std::exp( -qq * rr2) * ( xp - xn );
00174         rk(2,j) = -2 * qq * std::exp( -qq * rr2) * ( yp - yn );
00175         rk(3,j) = -2 * qq * std::exp( -qq * rr2)
00176             + 4 * qq * qq * std::pow( xp - xn, 2 ) * std::exp( -qq * rr2);
00177         rk(4,j) = 4 * qq * qq * std::exp( -qq * rr2) * ( xp - xn ) * ( yp - yn );
00178         rk(5,j) = -2 * qq * std::exp( -qq * rr2)
00179             + 4 * qq * qq * std::pow( yp - yn, 2 ) * std::exp( -qq * rr2);
00180       }
00181       break;
00182     }
00183 
00184     case 10:
00185       // rbfType = 10 -> Wu-C2
00186       // Compute R(i,j) = (1 - radius/d_c)^5 * (8 + 40*(radius/d_c) + 48*(radius/d_c)^2 + 25*(radius/d_c)^3 + 5*(radius/d_c)^4 )
00187       for (int j=0; j<nn; ++j){
00188         xn = gp->supportNodes[j]->getx();
00189         yn = gp->supportNodes[j]->gety();
00190         rr2 = std::pow( xp - xn, 2) +
00191             std::pow( yp - yn, 2);
00192         rr = std::pow( rr2, 0.5 );
00193 
00194         if (rr < d_c){
00195           rk(0,j) = std::pow(1 - rr/d_c, 5)
00196               * (  8 +
00197                   40*(rr/d_c) +
00198                   48*std::pow(rr/d_c, 2) +
00199                   25*std::pow(rr/d_c, 3) +
00200                   5*std::pow(rr/d_c, 4) ) ;
00201           rk(1,j) = ( 5*std::pow(1 - rr/d_c, 4) * (-1/d_c)
00202                       * (  8 +
00203                           40*(rr/d_c) +
00204                           48*std::pow(rr/d_c, 2) +
00205                           25*std::pow(rr/d_c, 3) +
00206                           5*std::pow(rr/d_c, 4) )
00207                 + std::pow(1 - rr/d_c, 5)
00208                   *(  40 / d_c +
00209                       96*rr / std::pow(d_c, 2) +
00210                       75*std::pow(rr, 2) / std::pow(d_c, 3) +
00211                       20*std::pow(rr, 3) / std::pow(d_c, 4) ) )
00212               * ( xp - xn ) / rr ;
00213           rk(2,j) = ( 5*std::pow(1 - rr/d_c, 4) * (-1/d_c)
00214               * (  8 +
00215                   40*(rr/d_c) +
00216                   48*std::pow(rr/d_c, 2) +
00217                   25*std::pow(rr/d_c, 3) +
00218                   5*std::pow(rr/d_c, 4) )
00219               + std::pow(1 - rr/d_c, 5)
00220               *(  40 / d_c +
00221                   96*rr / std::pow(d_c, 2) +
00222                   75*std::pow(rr, 2) / std::pow(d_c, 3) +
00223                   20*std::pow(rr, 3) / std::pow(d_c, 4) ) )
00224               * ( yp - yn ) / rr ;
00225         } else{
00226           rk(0,j) = 0.;
00227           rk(1,j) = 0.;
00228           rk(2,j) = 0.;
00229           rk(3,j) = 0.;
00230           rk(4,j) = 0.;
00231           rk(5,j) = 0.;
00232         }
00233       }
00234       break;
00235   }
00236   if (mm > 0){
00237       rk(0, nn) = 1.;
00238       if (mm > 1){
00239         rk(0, nn+1) = xp;
00240         rk(1, nn+1) = 1.;
00241         if(mm > 2){
00242           rk(0, nn+2) = yp;
00243           rk(2, nn+2) = 1.;
00244         }
00245         else std::cout << "WARNING: incomplete polynomial." << std::endl;
00246       }
00247   }
00248 
00249   // Solving linear system g_o*phii = rk(i) = lhs;
00250   lmx::LinearSystem<double> lsys(g_o, phii, lhs);
00251   // PHI and derivatives (6 systems are solved):
00253   // CHANGED FOR SOLVING ONLY 3 SYSTEMS: PHI AND FIRST PARTIAL DERIVATIVES (dX AND dY)
00255   for (int k=0; k<3; ++k){
00256     for (int j = 0; j < nn; ++j)
00257       lhs(j) = rk(k,j);
00258     lsys.solveYourself();
00259     for (int j = 0; j < nn; ++j){
00260       this->phi(k,j) = phii(j);
00261     }
00262   }
00263 
00264 
00265   double sumphi = 0;
00266   for(int i=0; i<nn ;++i){
00267     sumphi += this->phi(0,i);
00268   }
00269   cout << "nPs: " << nn << ", SUM_PHI = " << sumphi << endl;
00270 //   cout << "PHI = " << phi << endl;
00271 
00272 
00273 //   this->gnuplotOut();
00274 }
00275
